page.title: 18SPORT IN THORNTON CLEVELEYS
page.content: THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT SPORTS PLAYED IN THIS AREA.IN OUR SCHOOL FOR INSTANCE WE PLAY SOCCER,NETBALL, CRICKET,ROUNDERS AND LONG-BALL. FOR P.E. WE USE A NUMBER OF DIFFERENT ITEMS OF APPARATUS. IN THE AREA WE HAVE A MODERN SPORTS CENTRE WITH AN OUTDOOR SOCCER PITCH ALONGSIDE FOR ALL WEATHER GAMES. THEY HAVE SUCH ACTIVITIES AS BADMINTON AND SQUASH. IF ONE IS GOOD ENOUGH THERE ARE TOWN TEAMS FOR GOOD FOOTBALLERS AND, IN ADDITION,THERE ARE INTER-SCHOOL COMPETITIONS FOR ROUNDERS,SOCCER, NETBALL ,SWIMMING AND ATHLETICS. ALTHOUGH WE DO NOT HAVE A PUBLIC SWIMMING POOL,THERE ARE TWO NEARBY: AT POULTON AND AT FLEETWOOD.WE DO HAVE A LEARNER POOL. BY{CHRISTOPHER BEVAN,STANAH C.P.SCH.}
